entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening and ending before morning. Fog patches developing this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 5.
